title: [1.6.4-1.7.10]实用的MC自定义mod-Minetweaker3!(附modtweaker)[TF搬运]
author: SSCXM
txt_content:
本帖最后由 SPE__HaiKuo 于 2015-2-16 20:55 编辑 

mod介绍
以下文字摘于minetweaker官网
MineTweaker is a Minecraft Forge mod that allows you to alter Minecraft to your needs. It's an essential tool to increase modpack quality and allows you to alter or remove crafting recipes, furnace recipes, mod machine recipes for supported mods, item renaming and ore dictionary modification.
翻译：
minetweaker是一个让您能够对Minecraft进行您所需的修改的mod。这是提升一个整合包质量的必备工具，它能够允许你修改，添加或删除合成配方，熔炼配方，它所支持的mod机器配方，重命名物品甚至是矿物词典条目！
相信看了这段介绍大家已经对minetweaker有了一个较为浅显的了解，事实上，大部分国外优秀的整合包（如：FTB Modpacks）都采用了这个mod进行大量的自定义设置
它能够：
自定义（修改，添加，删除）合成台配方自定义烧炼配方自定义矿物词典条目重命名物品自定义部分mod的机器配方
minetweaker目前正不断地扩大自己的mod支持数目，目前已经能够支持的mod有：
NEIIC2 EXP格雷科技MFR建筑
计划支持的mod林业
这个mod有个基友mod，名字叫做modtweaker，它为minetweaker添加了更多mod的支持（如神秘时代4，匠魂，血魔法）！
modtweaker的下载地址是这个（只有1.7.x的modtaweaker支持minetweaker3,1.6.4版本仅支持minetweaker2）：http://minecraft.curseforge.com/mc-mods/220954-modtweaker

使用方法
具体看官方wiki：http://minetweaker3.powerofbytes.com/wiki/Main_Page
当然为了方便阅读也可以看我做的教程向帖子：http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-304800-1-1.html
1.6.4之前需要用minetweaker2的人可以看这里：http://minetweaker.powerofbytes.com/

下载
度盘：http://pan.baidu.com/s/1mgr6StU
更新日志：
 
Version 3.0.9CFixed removed recipe rollback being broken in some rare occurrencesTemporarily disabled support for BuildCraft 6.1 . This fixes a crash on startup with BC 6.1
Version 3.0.9BFixed some wrongs in data matching, causing crashes with onlyWithTag in some casesFixed a variable check when resolving variables (caused a crash)Fixed multiple saplings with the same ID not working in the PlanterFixed crash when using /mt hand on a dedicated serverFixed crash in /mt recipes in some casesAdded a couple missing Harvester functions

Version 3.0.9Added BuildCraft supportImproved exception handling; exceptions that break scripts will now log to the minetweaker log for better bugfixing/mt hand now copies to the clipboard/mt hand now also outputs the oredict entries it is inAdded /mt recipes commandAdded /mt recipes hand commandCan now properly add strings and formatted stringsRemoved COMMAND: in the minetweaker.log file in front of lines generated from commands
Version 3.0.8BFixed furnace handler crashing in 1.7 on some mods.
Version 3.0.8transformReplace now gives the replacement item in the player inventory if it is port of a stack (instead of modifying the whole stack)Added noReturn transformation to avoid any item from being returned. Suppresses programmed vanilla/mod behavior to, for example, given a bucket back.Added giveBack() and giveBack(item) transformation to return the item, or a replacement item, back into the inventory instead of the crafting table. Fixes fighting between transformations and default mod/vanilla behavior.Added tooltip support. Includes formatted tooltips.Added ability for mods to execute MineTweaker scripts via IMC messagesPorted chest loot modification from ModTweakerPorted setLocatization from ModTweakerAdded dev buildsFixed asterisks in multiline comments breaking script parsing.Fixed removeShaped function not working properly if no ingredients are given.Fixed addAll for oredict entries in 1.7.10
Version 3.0.7Added MFR support for 1.6.4 and 1.7.10 (not all machines and documentation is finished yet)Added /mt entities command to see all registered entitiesAdded /mt biomes command to see all biomes in the gameAdded mirrored shaped recipesCan now make recipes work only in a specific game modeCan now make simple function recipesFixed spaces in item namesAdded block info command. Gives information about blocks you are clicking onMods can now use the onReload function to execute certain actions upon reloadNBT compound tags with non-identifier keys should now be output properly
Version 3.0.0
Initial release.
Version 3.0.1Secured the in-game minetweaker command to be op-onlyCan now open wiki, bugs and forum from the /mt command (/mt wiki, /mt bugs, /mt forum)
Version 3.0.2Added interface to game, client and serverAdded transformationsMade ingredient conditions more practical to use, no longer requires importsStarted implementation of event handlingMoved commands and logic to the common API codeAdded common interface to MineTweaker recipesAdded string methodsMoved the logger from static value to static getterFixed crashes on dedicated serversFixed bracket resolution for <id:meta> values in 1.6.4Fixed scripts not being sent to multiplayer clients in 1.6.4
Version 3.0.3Finished IC2 support (and extended it to 1.6.4)Extended NEI support to 1.7.10Fixed crash upon startup in 1.7.10Can now craft with IC2 tools and have it consume energy upon craftingFixed 1.7.10 chat messages resulting in a stack overflow3.0.3B: fixed 1.7.10 not being built properly, causing items not to be resolved and breaking the entire API interface in general
Version 3.0.4Fixes crash when opening DartCraft clipboardAdded GregTech support for 1.6.4
